name: Dogfight Elite: A historical MMO flight simulator
blurb: A historical MMO flight simulator for all platforms (now with Oculus Rift support!)

rewards.reward: The Supporter: You'll get our undying thanks! You'll also get your name listed on our site. We'll print your name, stick it on the wall and look to it whenever we are in need of inspiration!

The Early Backer: You'll get our undying thanks! You'll also get your name listed on our site. We'll print your name, stick it on the wall and look to it whenever we are in need of inspiration!\r\n\r\nAlso, you will receive early access to the beta mobile version of the game on Android, iOS or Windows Phone 8. The first 250 backers will receive a digital download of the game Dogfight Elite for $10! (Suggested retail price is $25)

The Gamer: A digital download of Dogfight Elite on any of the desired available platforms! (iOS, Android,  Windows Phone 8, PC/MAC, and any platform we can make it available for!)\r\n\r\nAlso access to the private Dogfight Elite forums where you will be able to interact with the team during the development process!
The Duo Gamer: You will receive TWO digital copies of Dogfight Elite. In short, TWO The Gamer rewards so that you can play with your family, friends or frienemies!

The Featured Actor: You'll get all previous rewards PLUS a limited edition Dogfight Elite t-shirt!\r\n\r\nYou will also be eligible to appear on a future Dogfight Elite promotional video (you, your voice or you playing Dogfight Elite!)

The Dogfighter: You'll get all previous rewards PLUS a physical Dogfight Elite box copy of the game with booklet and all, showing the creation process and much art-work!

You will also receive a unique in-game airplane SPECIALLY made only available for Kickstarter pledgers!

And

Your name will also appear in the game's credits as backer and patron!

The Legendary Dogfighter: You will receive all previous rewards: two digital copies, the box, the in-game plane, etc...

And also:

ALPHA ACCESS: Beta access is not soon enough? We will give you alpha access so that you can begin testing with us the game as soon as possible! This means you will be in direct contact with us and you will be first in line to provide valuable input to the making of Dogfight Elite!

For all your support, the team members will personally sign your physical copy of Dogfight Elite. Just because, you rock!

We can include a personal message of your choice if you wish (a gift note for someone special?)

Duo Legendary Dogfighter: Do you want two physical copies of the game with alpha access so that you can enjoy with friends or give it away as a gift? This is your reward! TWO The Legendary Dogfighter rewards. Meaning 2 physical copies, 4 digital downloads, t-shirts, and so on!

The Squadron Leader: Add to all previous rewards the ability to create your own squadron and manage it during alpha/beta! Also a limited edition Dogfight Elite t-shirt with your name, pilot name or text of your choice on it!\r\n\r\nThis limited edition t-shirt design will be different to the previous reward and exclusively available for this selected group of kickstarter backers!

The Air Marshal Backer: All previous rewards PLUS a physical diecast aircraft at 1:48 scale of one of the planes used as a model for the creation of the game!\r\n\r\nNote: Only 5 available. We can't give these to any other reward.

The Air Marshal Backer We've got more airplanes! The Squadron Leader rewards PLUS a physical diecast aircraft at 1:48 scale of one of the planes used as a model for the creation of the game! Note: Only 15 more available. We can't give these to any other reward.

The Marshal of the Royal Air Force: Pick your own airplane paintings! Pick a plane from the game you like best, tell us how you want it painted and we'll go ahead and include it on the game but you'll be the only pilot who can choose this painting! You can even name the decal after you!
We'll also send you a poster and t-shirt!

Note: Plane paintings must be suitable for all audiences: Rated E for Everyone :)

The Historic Heritage: Do you want to be able for anyone to pick your colors? This is the reward!  We place your logo and paintings on any airplane of your choice. Up to 4 different aircraft. Then the whole world can pick up those colors and fly with them!

The Mission Creator: Do you belong to a veteran group, are you part of a museum or just want to leave your mark? The Historic Heritage reward PLUS you'll have exclusive access to us and work on the creation of a special secret mission that will be included in Dogfight Elite. Always dreamed of creating a mission for a game? This is your chance! You'll have bragging rights for it in the credits!

Marketing Guru backer! We will work with you on the creation of a landmark with your organization logo/info on it, adjusted to WWI or WWII style for everyone to see when they play online! This will be there forever, as part of Dogfight Elite! Imagine if your organization, squadron or museum existed during the wars, having it on our map would be awesome! We would love to have your logo/info included as part of the game!\r\n\r\nNote: No adult content allowed. To clarify rules, please contact us before pledging.
